title.rendered: Financial Commission Announces InvestingPro as Latest Approved Member

content.rendered:
July 17th, 2018, The Financial Commission, a leading independent member-driven external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for international online brokerages that participate in global foreign exchange (forex), derivatives, and CFD markets, today announces InvestingPro as its newest approved Member.

InvestingPro status as an A-category Member of the Financial Commission took effect on July 17, 2018, following the approval of its membership application by Financial Commission, thus allowing the company and its customers access to a wide range of services and membership benefits including, but not limited to, protection for up to €20,000 per submitted complaint, backed by the Financial Commission’s compensation fund.

 

Financial Commission provides brokerages and their customers with an unbiased 3rd party mediation platform that helps resolve complaints in instances when parties are unable to directly come to an agreement over disputes.

For approved members and their clients participating in CFDs, foreign exchange (forex) and cryptocurrency markets, Financial Commission helps facilitate a simpler, swifter resolution process than through typical regulatory channels such as arbitration or local court systems.

InvestingPro joins a diverse range of brokerages and independent services providers (ISPs) that utilise the services of the Financial Commission and as part of their commitment to their clients while upholding membership requirements.

About InvestingPro

InvestingPro is building an ambitious and passionate Financial Services business. It is a place of opportunities where exceptional results are achieved by dynamic professionals who are empowered to build their own and the company’s future. It is a company which is proud of its heritage, its multi-cultural positioning and its ability to offer global trading and investments. InvestingPro carefully selects its markets and clients, and aim to provide very high quality, honest, responsible and reliable services. The company invests in change, its people, and industry and invites you to be part of its journey.

For more information please contact InvestingPro directly.

About Financial Commission

Financial Commission is an independent external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for consumers/traders who are unable to resolve disputes directly with their financial services providers that are members of the Financial Commission. Financial Commission initially set out to provide a new approach for traders and brokers alike to resolve any issues that arise in the course of trading electronic markets such Foreign Exchange, and then expanded into CFDs and related derivatives, in addition to certifying technology platforms used for trading.

For more information please contact us at info@financialcommission.org.
